commentBody: How about the Wisconsin Badger basketball team taking down the undefeated Kentucky Wildcats in the NCAA national semi-final two years ago?  All the pundits said Kentucky was capable of beating many NBA teams and they'd already been anointed as the presumed national champions.  Wisconsin was certainly no slouch, but very few gave them any chance against the one and done, McDonald's All American loaded, "student athlete" Kentucky team.
